Kim Jong Il Receives Gift from Iranian Delegation 
    Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the IRNA delegation on a visit to the DPRK.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by its President Abdollah Naseri Taheri who is heading the delegation on Feb. 26.
